card_text: If you control "Supreme King Z-ARC": Activate 1 of these effects (but you can only use each effect of "Miracle of the Supreme King" once per turn);$N●Destroy 1 "Supreme King Z-ARC" you control, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Odd-Eyes" Pendulum Monster or 1 LIGHT "Supreme King Z-ARC" from your Deck or Extra Deck, ignoring its Summoning conditions.$N●Place 1 face-up Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck in your Pendulum Zone.$N●Set 1 Quick-Play Spell directly from your Deck.
